text: 9.13 Hos 6.6, Mat 12.7, Mak 2.17, Luk 5.32, 1 Ti 1.15 Pen God takaw ñu kɨl tɨkɨlak olap, nɨbi am takaw jɨj ak nɨgtep gɨl nɨgɨlɨg yenɨmɨb agak. God ne anɨb agup, Yɨp tap sɨbog ñɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos ma nepin agup agak. Binɨb okok kɨlop mapen nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin agup agak. Binɨb gɨtep gɨlɨg mɨdebal okok kɨlop suk agɨnɨg ma opin agak. Binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok kɨlop suk agɨnɨg opin agak.
